1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ pi NA d+hi kri ta sA d+ha na 
1b2(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ sgrub pa'i thabs mdor byas pa/ 'jam dpal 
1b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// khams gsum spyod pa 
1b4(rgyud 'grel): las grol mkha' dang mnyam gyur dngos po'i ngo bo nyid/ dag cing zhi la 
1b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam dben mchog ni rang bzhin rnal 'byor pa nyid yul// rtogs dka' 
2a1(rgyud 'grel): brtag par dka' la bdag gzhan rab phan khyab cing mtshan ma med/ rgyal 
2a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bde ba mnyam med mnyam sku mi rtog tshul gcig la phyag 'tshal// dang ldan 'dus pa'i 
2a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kyi ni// don bsdus rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// sems can kun la phan skyed pa'i// 
2a4(rgyud 'grel): mdor bsdus bdag gis bshad par bya// rnam rtog bag chags zhes pa yis// 'gro ba 
2a5(rgyud 'grel): ma pa ma / rgyu dang dungs lags pas// 'byung chud rgyas
2a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya// 'dod pa lnga ni yongs spangs nas// dka' thub kyis ni gdung med par// rnal 'byor 
2a7(rgyud 'grel): tu bya bya chu du bya zla du gyung nga na nga 
2b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs la// bde bas byang chub bsgrub par bya// des na 'di na sdom gnas yin// rtag tu mi phyed brtul zhugs gang // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// sgrub pa dag kyang brtsam par bya// 
2b2(rgyud 'grel): mgon po chen po'i sa phyogs ni// me tog 'bras bu sogs kyis brgyan// ri bo dben pa dag tu ni// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa bsgrub// 'jam pa'i stan la 'dug nas ni// sems dpa'i dkyil 
2b3(rgyud 'grel): krung legs gnas te// zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gnas// gnas bsrung ba ni bsam par bya// 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro 'jigs par byed// nyi ma la gnas hUM las byung // g.yon brkyang ba yi gnas pas 
2b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas// khro bo bcu ni spro bar bya// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rtse mo ni// rim pa bzhin du bsam par bya// bgegs kun rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// gnod mdzes bka' stsal phur bus gdab// 
2b5(rgyud 'grel): oM suM b+ha ni su b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya to/ b+ha ga bAn bi d+ya ra dza hUM phaT/ khro bo'i gzugs can 'di yis ni// bgegs kyi dbang po nyid bkug nas// blo dang ldan pas 
2b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba yis// cho ga bzhin du phur bus gdab// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che// ut+pal sngon po 'dab ma'i mdog/ 'bar phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa// rdo rje phur bu rnam par bsgom// lte ba'i phyogs nas smad kyi
2b7(rgyud 'grel): cha// rtse mo lta bur rnam par bsam// stod ni khro bo'i dbyibs can te// zhal gsum phyag drug lta bur bsgom// de yi gsang sngags legs brjod la// bgegs kyi tshogs la 'og gzigs pas// 
2b8(rgyud 'grel): rdorje bur dbungs btab na// bgegs kyi sus ni mig yo 'gyur// oMg+hak+Sha g+hA ta ya b+hAta ba/ sarba dudz+nyA phaT phaT/ trail ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT phaT d+hAdz+dzadz+dza/ badz+ra ke lA ya/ badz+ran pos dz+nyA pa 5/ 
3a1(rgyud 'grel): sarba big+h+nA nan/ kA ya bA ka tsit+ta/ kI la ya b+hu hUM hUM phaT phaT/ rdo rje tho ba phyag bsnams pa'i// gnod mdzes rgyal po rnam par bsam// rdo rje mi yis kun tra ni// rnam par 'phro bas nges par bsgom/ 
3a2(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa tshig pa phan tshun du// 'bros par gyur pa rnam par bsam// phyogs bcu phur bus btab nas ni// steng 'og yang dag byin gyis brlab// dam pa'i don du dngos po rnams// srid gsum dngos po med par bsgom// 
3a3(rgyud 'grel): dngos po med la bsgom pa'i dngos// bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min// de ltar dngos po dngos med pas// bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o// tshigs bcad 'di yis rgyu mi rgyu'i// bdag nyid can rnams stong par bsgom// 
3a4(rgyud 'grel): cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yi ni// ye shes sa bzhir byin gyis brlab// nam mkha' dbyings kyis dbus gnas par // hUM gnyis sa bon yaM las byung // rdo rje gnyis dang yang dag ldan// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// hA 
3a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis sa bon raM las byung // rdo rje gnyis dang yang dag ldan// me yi dkyil 'khor nyid kyang ni// de yi steng du rnam par bsam// hUM gnyis sa bon baM las byung // rdo rje gnyis dang yang dag ldan// chu yi dkyil 'khor 
3a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyang ni// de yi steng du rnam par bsam// hUM gnyis sa bon laM las byung // rdo rje gnyis dang yang dag ldan// sa yi dkyil 'khor nyid kyang ni// de yi steng du rnam par bsam// dkyil 'khor bzhi po yang dag bsdu/ 
3a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sa yi dkyil 'khor la// der ni b+h+rUM las byung ba yi// gzhal yas khang ni rnam par bsgom// zur bzhi dang ni sgo bzhi dang // rta babs bzhi yis mdzes byas pa// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// ka ba brgyad 
3a8(rgyud 'grel): kyis yang dag mdzes// dra ba dra ba phyed pa dang // rdo rje nor bu zla byed brgyan// gla yi mtshams ni thams cad dang // gro dang mo khyud mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// phyi yi dkyil 'khor 
3b1(rgyud 'grel): thig gdab bya// bum pa ka ba rdo rje che// bre la bya ni rim bzhin gnas// bi dan dril bu mdzes byas la// rnga yab sogs kyis rnam par brgyan// bdag nyid phyag rgyar ldan pa ni// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa 
3b2(rgyud 'grel): can// in+d+ra nI la'i 'od mnyam pa// dkyil 'khor dbus su bsgom par bya// rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen dang // 'od dpag med dang las kyi rgyal// zhal gsum phyag drug lta bur ni// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs 
3b3(rgyud 'grel): su bsam// gti mug dga' sogs lha mo rnams// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// me'i phyogs nas brtsams nas su// rim pa ji bzhin nges par dgod// de bzhin gzugs rdo rje la sogs// phyi yi mtshams 
3b4(rgyud 'grel): ni rnam pa bzhir// reg bya rdo rje nyid kyang ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dang ldan gnas// byams pa sa yi snying po dag/ shar gyi snam bur dgod par bya// phyag na rdo rje mkha' snying po// brtul zhugs can gyi lho ru dgod// 'jig 
3b5(rgyud 'grel): rten dbang phyug 'jam pa'i dbyangs// nub tu yang ni dgod par bya// sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel dang // kun tu bzang po byang phyogs su// gshin rje gshed ni shar gyi sgor// gzhan gyis mi thub lho phyogs su// nub phyogs 
3b6(rgyud 'grel): su ni rta mgrin te// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa byang du'o// mi g.yo 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang // dbyug sngon dang ni stobs po che// shar lho mtshams sogs nas brtsams te// rim pa ji bzhin bsgom par bya// gnod mdzes rgyal po khro bo 
3b7(rgyud 'grel): che// de yi 'od tu rnam par bsam// gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur rgyal yang // de bzhin steng du rnam par bsgom// cho ga ji bzhin dkyil 'khor pa// de ltar lhag par mos bsam nas// slar yang kha sbyar sbyor ba yis// rang gi lus 
3b8(rgyud 'grel): la de rnams gzhug/ lus kyi 'khor lo rdzogs sangs rgyas// rim pa ji bzhin yang dag bsam// don dam pa yi rdo rje yis// de bzhin nyid la gzhug bya bas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad na// dngos grub rab/ 
4a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog thob par 'gyur// 'di don rdo rje phreng ba las// gsal bar ji bzhin rnam phye ste// gzugs phung gtogs dang me long dang // sa khams mig gi dbang po dang // gzugs dang rnam lngar gyur pa ste// 
4a2(rgyud 'grel): khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan// tshor ba'i phung po mnyam nyid dang // chu khams rna ba'i dbang po dang // sgra dang rnam sngar gyur pa ste// khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan// 'du shes so sor rtog pa dang // byin za sna yi dbang po dang // 
4a3(rgyud 'grel): dri dang rnam lngar gyur pa ste// khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan// 'du byed bya ba grub pa dang // rlung khams lce yi dbang po dang // ro dang rnam lngar gyur pa ste// khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan// steng 'og khro bo shin tu bcas// rang bzhin 
4a4(rgyud 'grel): kyigyis ni snang ba nyid// rnam shes phung por zhugs pa ste// rnam shes kyang ni 'od gsal ba'o// mya ngan 'das bcas kun stong dang // chos kyi skur yang bshad pa yin// brtan par bya ba'i don du ni// gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par 
4a5(rgyud 'grel): bya// oM shUn tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ 'di ni don dam dkyil 'khor te// snang ba med cing mtshan nyid med// don dam bden pa zhes bya ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// 'od gsal bar ni rab zhugs nas// 
4a6(rgyud 'grel): ldang ba yang ni bstan par bya// sngags kyi su yi sbyor ba yis// lha yi gzugs la dmigs par 'gyur// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sngags pas de yi steng du yang // zla
4a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam// der ni pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad// kha dog dmar po bsgom par bya// pad+ma'i steng du sngags chen po// yi ge gsum ni de nas bsam// sngags dang pad+ma nyi ma dag/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
4a8(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kun rdzogs gyur// byang chub sems su rnam par rtag/ rgyu dang mi chu thams cad kyang // de nyid du ni rnam bsam zhing // brtan par bya ba'i don du ni// gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya// oM d+harma 
4b1(rgyud 'grel): d+hAd+hatu swa b+hA ba at+ma ko&haM/ de ltar sbyor ba dmigs nas su// rjes su sbyor ba brtsam par bya// rnal 'byor pa yi yig gsum yang // zla ba'i dbus su rnam par bsam// de nas yig gsum las byung ba// kun da zla ba 
4b2(rgyud 'grel): dkar dang mtshungs// dang po mgon po bsams nas kyang // shin tu sbyor ba yang dag brtsam// mi bskyod pas ni rjes zhugs pas// zhal gsum phyag drug 'bar ba dang // in+d+ra nI la'i 'od mnyam pa'i// rdo rje sems 
4b3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rnam par bsgom// rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma ni// g.yas pa'i phyag tu rnam par bsam// dril bu rin chen ral gri ni// g.yon pa'i phyag tu bsam par bya// de nas phung po la sogs pa'i// dbye ba shes 
4b4(rgyud 'grel): pas snang mdzad sogs// gnod mdzes bar du sa bon gyis// dgod pas yang dag nyid du dgod// rnam snang mdzad 'di sa bon ni// kha dog dkar po yi ge oM// gzugs phung ngo bo nyid kyis ni// sngags shes
4b5(rgyud 'grel): pas ni spyi bor dgod// a ni mgon po 'od dpag med// 'du shes phung po'i ngo bo nyid// mdog dmar kha la bsams nas ni// ngag gi dbang phyug nyid thob 'gyur// mi bskyod pa yi yi ge hUM// rab tu bzang po'i mthing/ 
4b6(rgyud 'grel): shing mdog/ rnam shes phung po'i ngo bo nyid// sngags pas snying gar rnam par bsgom// rin chen mgon po'i yi ge swA// tshor ba'i phung po'i ngo bo nyid// tshor ba dag gi rgyu can ni// kha dog ser po lte bar dgod// rkang pa 
4b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis la yi ge hA// 'du byed phung po'i ngo bo nyid// las kyi mgon po de nyid ni// sngags pas kha dog ljang gur dgod// gti mug dga' sogs sngags kyis ni// sa la sogs la rab tu gzhug/ sra dang gsher dang dro ba 
4b8(rgyud 'grel): dang // rlung sogs der ni rim pa bzhin// blo mig tu bkod nas ni// sa yi snying po rnam par bsgom// oM ni rna ba dag la dgod// phyag na rdo rje bsgom par bya// oM ni sA la rab bkod do// nam mkha'i snying po rab tu bsgom/ 
5a1(rgyud 'grel): sa kyil ga dus// 'dig dbang ba rkag par bya// yid pasbyin pas pa nams// 'ja ma dpa la dbyas ra bathub rnam// las min mas can la// bsgrums nas rlabs madra par bya// mi go man 
5a2(rgyud 'grel): tsar bzhag ste// byams pa nyid du yangasas brtag/ gzhan la nisam ko dade// glen na pazang thobam ma par gyi// lag pa gas bdag shi rjegashed// g.yon pa gnan gyis me papa// mchin lalabs sa par bya/ rje 
5a3(rgyud 'grel): nga brkyeg// dang pagayas pa migs ga// ga napa da pa rgya pa'o// blam pa thams pa bsam pa// b+hag partan pa mi ga// bram me g.yon par stobs pa ni// skyeb gtsug ta bal bgyur// ma 
5a4(rgyud 'grel): mdze sa rgyal po bsam pa ni// nang pa gnyis la dgod par bya// dgod byas de nas sngags pa yis// phung po la sogs cho ga bzhin// sku yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs gyur nas// sbyor ba chen po yang dag brtsam// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang 
5a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs// skye dmas sa bas pa// den lag yi dgang gi/ 'di ba snan pa 'gro ba// de mas mod byu ba // bdag ci ni bslong ba// ldan dum pas mnas ni// rnamamapa 'thams cad btu dgang // des 
5a6(rgyud 'grel): sgra min rjen// rnam ma'a' ba bar legs gnas pa// de dbus bdag po bsgom pa ni// sram cun gnyis mtshan ca // depe byang bzang po btud rgyas brgyan// bdag kyang de yi mdudu gnas pa// de nas sngags pas tshigs bcad 
5a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis brjod nas ni gsol ba ga dag// dngal ldan sangs rgyas chang ba// rdo rje sa s+yAd gsum pa zhos b+hAs// de bdag sbyin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje sku ni mdzad drugasol// rdzogs bcung bzugs pa'i sangs nAn rnams/ 
5a8(rgyud 'grel): rdorjem byed gsum brnams pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nasas// de gra ni mang da drugasol// sun dang ldan cig ldan pa yi// rnam par snang mdzad bsams nas su// de bcug nas ni byin brlabs to// sra yi byin gyis 
5b1(rgyud 'grel): brlab pa brtsam// sangs rgyas kun gyis sku gang yin// phung po lnga yis rab gang ba// sangs rgyas sku yi ngo bo yis// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko&haM/ A ni kha dog dmar ldan pa/ 
5b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya le bad+mad rnam bsams te// gos dkar zhes bya nam mkha' du// smyos nas nam mkha'i khams rnams dgang // gsung gi de rje sngags pa ni// nam mkha'i dbus na bzhugs pa la// de nas sngags pas tshigs bcad 'di// gnyis da 
5b3(rgyud 'grel): nas nigasal bgad pa// chos kyi gsang lam dpal dang ldan// rdo rje sa byed gsum bsgom pas// deng bdag byin gyis parlabasanasas// de drug sung dam da dwags pa// phyugs bzung bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje'i 
5b4(rgyud 'grel): byed gsus bskams pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje gsung du mdzad dragasol// gos dkar me dang lhan cig nyid// rang ge gtso bor yang dag ldan// kye 'thugs par rababasams te// gsung gis byi gyis 
5b5(rgyud 'grel): brlab pa brtsam// rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang yin// nges pa'i tshig na phran sum tshugs// bdag go tshig kyang de 'dra zhing // chos 'dzin pa dang 'dra bar shog/ a sarbata thA ga ta thaka badz+ra sa thA ba at+ma ko&H/ sngags pas 
5b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing ga shes yi// gzugs pa nan 'bar babasas bya ste// der nes zing shing sa zam// 'dab yang ldan b+hadagadang // delas snyam mam te/ tshogs dang bcas pa dbyung bar bya// de bzhin thugs kyi 
5b7(rgyud 'grel): banam// de la ldan pazhin gsal ba gdab// dpal ldan do thugs 'chang ba// rnga rdzam byed gsum bsgom pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdon thugs su mdzad dragasal// phyogs 
5b8(rgyud 'grel): bzugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// dardzam gyi gsum pa rnams pas// rang bdag byen kyim brnabs rnams// de thugs sa mdang drugs la// mam chags ma lus pa// dang thugs dang yang dag pa// 
6a1(rgyud 'grel): yang ni bcug nas su// thugs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa brtsam// kun tu bzang po'i thugs gang yin// gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa// bdag kyang de dang 'dra gyur cig/ rdo rje 'dzin dang mtshungs
6a2(rgyud 'grel): par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ de ltar rigs gsum dbye ba yis// so sor byin gyis brlabs nas ni// blo dang ldan pas gsang sngags 'dis// slar yang thams cad bdag nyid bya// 
6a3(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ de ltar bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i// mtshan ma drug dang yang dag ldan// dam tshig sems dpa' bsgom par 
6a4(rgyud 'grel): bya// snying ga'i dbus su phra mo yi// ye shes sems dpa' rnam par bsgom// ting 'dzin sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i// yi ge hUM ni de ru dgod// sems dpa' gsum gyis bdag nyid can// de ltar sbyor ba cher 
6a5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed nas// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sgrub pa chen po brtsam par bya// gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan pa ni// swe sha can ni bdag nyid che// bu mo ut+pal mthing ga'i mdog/ mig yangs dam parnyed nas ni// 
6a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par bzhag cing legs par bslab// sgrub pa po la shin tu mos// oM ni spyi bor bsam par bya// AHni ngag gi lam la dgod// hU ni snying gar bsam bya zhing // lte bar sA dang rkang gnyis hA// spyan dang mA ma kI/ 
6a7(rgyud 'grel): dang ni// de bzhin du ni gos dkar mo// sgrol ma dang ni sngags pa yis// sa la sogs la rnam par dgod// lha mo rdo rje gzugs la sogs// de nyid la ni rnam bsams la// sa snying la sogs de rnams dang // snyoms 
6a8(rgyud 'grel): par 'jug pa bsgom par bya// lag g.yas rdo rje ro langs ma// g.yon la gzhan gyis mi thub ma// de ye khar ni khro gnyer ma// gsang bar ral pa gcig ma'o// gzhan yang dpung pa g.yas par ni// de bzhin gshegs yum 
6b1(rgyud 'grel): rdorje ma// g.yon du sna tshogs rin chen gyi// phyag rgya dag ni bsgom par bya// pus mo g.yas la gnas par yang // sna tshogs pad+ma de bzhin gshegs// g.yon pa las ni sna tshogs las/ spyi bor nam mkha'i rdo rje ma// rkang/ 
6b2(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis la sa yi ni// sa 'dzin lha mo bzhag par bya// de ltar 'dus byas rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje pad+ma yang dag brtsam// hUM gi sngags skyes rdo rje ni// rtse mo lnga pa bsam par bya// de tshe de yi rtse dbus su// oM ni rnam 
6b3(rgyud 'grel): par bsam par bya// de bzhin a las byung ba yi// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa ni// 'od zer lnga yis khyab bsam la// de 'od sgrub pa brtsam par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko&haM/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i 
6b4(rgyud 'grel): ngargyal legs 'chang ste// hUM gi glu yis kyang ni bskyod bya zhing // rang gi byang chub sems nyid phyung ba'i tshe// des ni phaT gyis gsang sngags brjod par bya// phyung nas slar yang sngags pas ni// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs 
6b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnams// byang chub sems kyis mchod nas ni// gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ rang sngags yi ge las dbyung ba// rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlabs bdag/ pad+ma'i 
6b6(rgyud 'grel): dbus su bskyed nas ni// slar yang zhe sdang rdo rjer gyur// badz+ra d+h+r-ika sngags kyis dbyung ba// mi bskyod rdo rjer bsam pa yang // mgon po ral pa thor tshugs can// mi bskyod pas ni dbu brgyan byas// mthing zhing bzang po'i 
6b7(rgyud 'grel): mdog ltar snang // sngon ga dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom// rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma ni// g.yas pa'i phyag du bsam bya zhing // dril bu rin chen ral 
6b8(rgyud 'grel): gri ni// de yi g.yon la bsam par bya// 'di ni thugs ka las byung nas// phyogs bcu rnams su gzigs nas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // sangs rgyas mdzad pa kun mdzad de// sems can ma lus 
7a1(rgyud 'grel): kun sbyad ska nas// zhe sdang rdo rje gnas la 'jog/ slar byon rdo rje mgon po ni// spyan snga ru ni 'dug par gyur// sngags pas de yi snying ga ru// rjes zhugs bdag nyid rnam sgom pas// snga ma'i gzugs 
7a2(rgyud 'grel): ni yongs gyur nas// zhe sdang rdo rje gnas su zhugs// in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'bar ba// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs// dpa' bo rang gi phyag rgyas 'khyud // rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// drag po zhi dang 'dod 
7a3(rgyud 'grel): chags che// zhal gsum gyis ni rnam par mdzes// zhe sdang rdo rje ting 'dzin gnas// dkyil 'khor thams cad spro bar mdzad// dzi na dzi ka sngags kyis dbyung ba// gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad dbyung // mi bskyod pas ni 
7a4(rgyud 'grel): dbu rgyan byas// ston ka'i zla zer ltar snang zhing // thor tshugs cod pan dag gis brgyan// dkar dang gnag dang dmar ba'i zhal// phyag drug zhi ba'i gzugs can te// 'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma dag/ g.yas pa la ni rnam par 
7a5(rgyud 'grel): bsam// dril bu rin chen ral gri ni// 'di yi g.yon du rnam par sgom// de bzhin thugs ka las byung ste// gti mug spyod nas sems can rnams// yang dag sbyangs te sbar byon nas// shar phyogs kyi ni zla bar 
7a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs// rat+na d+h+r-ika sngags kyis dbyung ba// rin chen tog ni sngags pas dbyung // zhi ba'i thor tshugs cod pan 'chang // mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas// mgon po ral pa'i thor tshugs can// ser dang gnag
7a7(rgyud 'grel): dang dkar ba'i zhal// phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom// yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje dang // 'khor lo de yi g.yas su bsgom// dril bu pad+ma ser po dang // ral gri g.yon du bsgom par bya// de bzhin thugs ka nas 
7a8(rgyud 'grel): grang ste// dargyal gnas la gnas pa rnams// yang dag rgyang sa dam kyi ma // gnyen dbum sa bcags par gzangs// ma cig zugs kyis byung ba// mtha' yas rje thung ste// gab par 
7b1(rgyud 'grel): ga'i'o// mi bskyod pas ni dbu brgyan byas// mgon po ral pa'i thor tshugs can// dmar dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal// sgeg pa'i nyams dang yang dag ldan// phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom// g.yon pa'i phyag 
7b2(rgyud 'grel): gi dril bu dang // pad+ma sdong bu 'dzin par mdzad// pad+ma thugs ka'i phyogs gnas pa// g.yas pa yis ni 'byed par mdzad// rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas nyid la// rin chen ral gri g.yon gnyis la// sngon bzhin 'dod 
7b3(rgyud 'grel): chags can sbyangs nas// rgyab kyi pad+ma la bzhugs 'gyur// pradz+nyA d+heka sngags kyis dbyung // bsngags pas don yod rdo rje can// mgon po sku mdog ljang khur dbyung // mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas// thor tshugs 
7b4(rgyud 'grel): cod pan dag gis brgyan// ljang dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal// byig drug 'od zer rnam par 'phro// ral gri sna tshogs rdo rje dang // 'khor lo g.yas su bsgoms par bya// phyag g.yon na ni dril bu dang // de bzhin pad 
7b5(rgyud 'grel): ljang nor bu'o// log pa'i ngang can sems can rnams// rnam par sbyangs nas slar byon te// de bzhin byang gi phyogs su ni// sna tshogs rdo rje dag la bzhugs// zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags// yid bzhin nor bu dam 
7b6(rgyud 'grel): tshig ste// rigs ni lnga po 'di dag nyid// 'dod dang thar par rab bsgrub pa'o// mo ha ra ti sngags kyis dbyung // lha mo can ni dbyung bar bya// dkar zhing zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan// rnam snang mdzad kyis spyi bor mtshan// 
7b7(rgyud 'grel): dkar dang gnag dang dmar ba'i zhal// phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom// 'khor lo rdo rje de bzhin du// ut+pal dkar po g.yas su bsam// dril bu de bzhin rin chen dang // ral gri g.yon du bsgom par bya// de bzhin 
7b8(rgyud 'grel): thugs ka nas byung ste// phyogs bcu dag tu gzigs nas ni// gdon dang nad gdungs 'jigs pa rnams// thugs rje chen pos zhi mdzad de// slar byon nas ni zla dkyil du// shar gyi mtshams su bzhugs par bya// dwe Shar 
8a1(rgyud 'grel): ta'i sngags kyis dbyung // lha mo mA ma kI dbyung ste// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ltar sngo// bzhin bzang shin tu yid du 'ong // gnag dang dkar dang dmar po ste// mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas// 'khor lo 
8a2(rgyud 'grel): rdorje de bzhin du// ut+pal sngo dmar g.yas pa la// dril bu rin chen ral gri ni// g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad// bgegs chen 'jigs pas gzir ba rnams// thugs rje chen pos bsrung bar 
8a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad// byung nas slar ni byon nas su// lho nub tu ni bzhugs par gyur// rA ga ra ta'i sngags kyis dbyung // gos dkar mo ni dbyung bya ste// zhal ni dmar dang gnag dang dkar// pad+ma rA ga'i 'od dang ldan// 
8a4(rgyud 'grel): 'od dpag med bcas ral pa'i tshogs// phyag drug pa ni rnam bsgoms te// g.yon pa dril brang bcas pa yis// ut+pal sdong bu 'dzin mdzad la// thugs kar gnas pa'i mal/ kau mar po g.yas kyis 'byed par 
8a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad// rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas dag la// nor bu rin chen ral gri g.yon// bsnams par mdzad pa phyung nas ni// gdon gyis nyen bzhi mdzad de// slar byon pad+ma'i dbus nyid du// nub byang mtshams su bzhugs par 'gyur// 
8a6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra ra ti'i sngags kyis dbyung // yid 'ong sgrol ma dbyung bya ste// ljang dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal// dur ba'i lo ma'i mdangs dang ldan// don yod pas ni gtsug tor byas// phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom// sna tshogs 
8a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'khor lo dang // ut+pal dkar po g.yas pa na// dril bu rin chen ral gri ni// brtul zhugs can gyis g.yon du bsam// sems can thams cad dbang mdzad de// sna tshogs rdo rje'i gdan la yang // byung nas slar ni 
8a8(rgyud 'grel): byon nas su// byang shar mtshams su bzhugs par 'gyur// rnal 'byor pas ni rim gnyis par// gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa byung // mi yi mtsham su dgod bya ba// rdo rje gzugs ni yid 'ong ba// zhal gsum phyag drug
8a9(rgyud 'grel): mas pa ma mamasas masamams masasas sa samamamatha mas mamamamamamasamamamamams samamamamamamamamamams mamamams sa sa ma ma mas pa sa mams pa mamalas mams pas mamasamam masams thams mas mam ma ya sa sa ma mams 
8b1(rgyud 'grel): dkar ba ste// dbu rgyad rnam par snang mdzad dpal// gnyis kyis me long 'dzin mdzad de// lhag ma gti mug dga' dang mtshungs// bden bral phyogs dgod lha mo ni// rdo rje dgra sta phyag drug pa// zhal gsum sku 
8b2(rgyud 'grel): mdog ser mo ste// rab rgyan rin chen 'byung ldan yin// phyag gnyis kyis ni pi ba bsdams// lhag ma mA ma kI dang mtshungs// rlung gi phyogs dgod lha mon// rdo rje driste phyag drug pa// zhal gsum su mdog dmar mo ste// snang 
8b3(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas kyi thor tshugs can// phyag gnyis kyis ni rung bsdams te/ lhag mgos dkar can dang mtshungs// dbang ldan phyogs dgod lha mo ni// rdo rje ro ste phyag drug pa// zhal gsum sku mdog ljang gu ste// dbu rgyan la ni rnga 
8b4(rgyud 'grel): sgra bzhugs// phyag gnyis la ni ro yi sdong // lhag ma sgrol ma lta bu yin// rdo rje sems dpa' legs 'khyud de// 'khor lo dbus na rab bzhugs par// rdo rje reg bya bsam bya ste// zhal sogs bdag po lta bu'o// 
8b5(rgyud 'grel): ris pa gsum pa shar gyini// skam bur brtul thugs can gyis dbyung // ma thil sa bon las byung ba// byams pa sa yi snying po gnyis// a gyis bon las byung ba/ ma rdo rjem snying / 
8b6(rgyud 'grel): yi phyogs kyi snam bu la// go rim bzhin du dgod par bya// oM dang hUM las yang dag byung // 'jig rten dbang phyug 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'di dag nub tu dbyung bar bya// byang gi phyogs su dbyung ba ni/ 
8b7(rgyud 'grel): oM dang saM gi sa bon skyes// sgrib sel kun tu bzang por bcas// 'di dag dbu rgyan rang gi mgon// su mdog sogs pa de dang mtshungs// phyag dang mtshon cha dag kyang ni// rang reng gi nri bArtig/ bor mtshungs/ 
8b8(rgyud 'grel): byams pa 'ba' zhig g.yas pa na// klu shing mi tog bsdams par mdzad// 'di dag skye mched rnam skyong zhing // lha yi mige sogs stsol ba po// sems can skye mched sbyangs nas su/ sl-ir byon nas ni stan la 
9a1(rgyud 'grel): bzugs// yanA d+ha ga ti sngags kyis ni// sngags pas gshin rje gshed dbyung ba// rnam par snang mdzad dbu rgyan can// nal ni gnag dang dkar dang mar// 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis rnam par bkrigs/ 
9a2(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pa rdo rje 'khor lo rnams// phyag g.yas na ni rnam par mdzad// thugs kar sdig mdzu ba zhags pa dang // dril bu dgra stagayon pa na// dbang po la sogs tshogs bcas dang // me bzang bgegs kyang skrab par/ 
9a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad// pad+ma nyim panan nas ni// shar gyi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur// prad+han kr-ita sngags kyi ni// rin chen 'byung ldan dab rgyan can// su mdog dkar ning nor bus brgyan// gzhan gyis mi thub sngags kyis 
9a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyung // gsus khyimacha zhing spun gsum pa// dkar dang gnag dang dmang ba'i zhal// mche ba gtsigs shing rnam par 'gyur// 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis rnam par 'khrigs// rdo rje dathug par bzi ni// g.yas kyi byu 
9a5(rgyud 'grel): na bsnams par mdzad// snying gar sdig mdzub zhags pa dang // dril bu dgra sA g.yon pa na// g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas pa yi// mi bzang bgegs ni sreg par mdzad// pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni// lho yi phyogs 
9a6(rgyud 'grel): sra bzhugs par gyur// pad+mAn+ta kr-ita sngags kyis ni// brtul zhugs can gyi rta mthen dbyung // spyan gsum pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ zhal ni dmar dang gnag dang dkar// zhal gdangs gsus khyimache ba dang // 'od dpag med 
9a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cod pan can// dpa' ba g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas// 'bar ba'i tshogs ni rnam par 'khrugs// pad+ma ral gri gzhun shing ni// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad// bsnyems dang bcas pas dril bu dang / 
9a8(rgyud 'grel): dgras zhags pa g.yon na bsdams// pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te// phyogs cu dag tu gzigs nas ni// khru rnams skrag mar mdzad nas su// nub kyi phyogs su bzhugs par 'gyur// big+h+nAn+ta krita sngags kyis ni// rnga s+tha'i 
9b1(rgyud 'grel): cod pan yang dag ldan// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ltar sngo// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dbyung bar bya// zhal ni sngo dang dmar dang dkar// zhal gdangs pa ni rnam par 'gyur// gsus khyim che zhing spyan gsum pa// 'bar ba'i 
9b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyis rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo dang // gtun shing rnams ni g.yas pa na// sdig mdzub zhags par bcas pa dang // dril bu dgra sta g.yon na bsnams// g.yon rkyang ba yis gnas pa 
9b3(rgyud 'grel): yis// pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni// byang gi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur// rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yis// mi g.yo ba yang dbyung bar bya// spyan gsum in+d+ra nI la'i mdog/ dbu rgyan rnam par snang mdzad 
9b4(rgyud 'grel): dpal// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal// zhal ni gnag dang dmar dang dkar// mi zad ha ha zhes bzhad sgra// gsus khyim che zhing stobs po che// ral gri rdo rje 'khor lo rnams// g.yas pa'i phyag na bsnams 
9b5(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad// sdigs mdzub dang ni dgra sta dang // zhags pa g.yon pa'i phyag na bsdams// rims sogs 'jigs pa'i gdon 'joms te// g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas pa yis// pad+ma nyi ma la gnas nas/ 
9b6(rgyud 'grel): shar lho mtshams su bzhugs par gyur// rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yis// brtul zhugs can gyis 'dod rgyal dbyung // drag po in+d+ra nI la'i mdog/ rin chen 'byung ldan dbu rgyan can// zhal ni gnag dang dmar 
9b7(rgyud 'grel): dang dkar// spyan gsum mche ba 'jigs su rung // phyag gnyis rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis// phyag rgya dag ni 'ching bar mdzad// rdo rje ral gri g.yas dag na// g.yon na zhags pa lcags kyu'o// bden bral bgegs 
9b8(rgyud 'grel): ni 'joms pa'o// g.yon brkyang gnas pas nyi mar bzhugs// rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yis// brtul zhugs can gyis dbyug sngon bskyed// spyan gsum sprin sngon lta bu ste// 'od dpag med pa'i dbu/ 
10a1(rgyud 'grel): rten can// nal ni sde dang dkar dang dmar// gsus khyimache zhing 'jigs par mdzad// dbyug par sa the 'khor lon// g.yas kyi phyag na bskams par mdzad// snying gar sdig mdzu bzhags/ 
10a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // dgra sta rnams ni g.yon na bsnams// yams kyi 'jigs pa bsal nas ni// gtum po g.yon kyang gnas pa yis// pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te// nub byang mtshams su bzhugs par 'gyur// rang gi 
10a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis bskyed pa yis// rnga s+tha yi na dbu rgyan can// stobs po che ni sngags pas dbyung // ut+pal sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba// zhal ni gnag dang dmar dang dkar// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i dgra 
10a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan// yan lag thams cad sbrul gyis brgyan// gsus khyimache zhing 'jigs par byed// dbyug pa ram gri 'khor lo ni// g.yas kyi phyag na bsdams par mdzad// snying gar sdigs mdzub ral gri 
10a5(rgyud 'grel): dang // zhags pa dgra sta g.yon na bsdams// g.yon brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis// mkha' 'gro la sogs 'jigs pa 'joms// pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te// byang shar mtshams su bzhugs par gyur// 
10a6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yi// gtsug tor 'khor lo bsgyur ba dbyung // mkha' ltar sngo bsangs 'jigs pa po// mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas// zhal ni sngo dang dmar dang dkar// gtso bo spyan gsum 
10a7(rgyud 'grel): gsus pa 'byung // g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi phyag gnyis kyis// spyi bor gtsug tor 'dzed par mdzad// rdo rje pad+ma g.yas dag na// sdig mdzub ral gri g.yon na bsnams// 'tshe ba thams cad rnam 'jig 
10a8(rgyud 'grel): cing // gta po g.yon bcung gnas pa yis// pad+ma nyim la gnas te// tshangs pa'i gnas su de bzhugs pa'o// rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yi// brtul zhugs can gyis gnod mdzes dpung // spyan gsum nam mkha' lta 
10b1(rgyud 'grel): bAr rang // dalan gdag dang dmar dang dkar// gsus khyim cha zhing 'jigs papanas// ma bsnyad pas na dburgyan byas// rdo rjeng la ma ran canan// g.yas pa phyag na 'dzin par mdzad// mA~M dgar 
10b2(rgyud 'grel): sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang // pad+ma ral gri g.yon na bsnabs// rgyu ba dang ni gnas pa'i drag/ ka la ku sogs kun dang // bgegs kyi bdag po kun bcom ste// thams cad zhi bar mdzad nas ni// 
10b3(rgyud 'grel): ma lus ka ni rdzogs byas la// g.yon brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis// pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te// sa yi 'og tu de bzhugs so// lhan sum cu gnyis rang bzhin// dkyil 'khor thams cad bskyed nas ni// 
10b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas gyur na// de nas phra mo'i rnal 'byor brtsam// sna yi rtse mor yungs kar bsam// 'gro dang mi 'gro yungs kar la// gsang ba'i sngags kyis brtags pa yi// ye shes mchog gi gnas 
10b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom mo// rin chen kha dog sna lnga la// yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam// sna yi rtse mor nan tan du// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom// rin chen brtan par gyur nas spro// brtan par ma gyur de mi spro// sangs 
10b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od mnyam pa// rab mchog sprin ni spro bar bya// slong mo za zhing mi bzlas te// ma spangs pal chags mi bya// 'dod pa kun las longs spyod cing // sngags kyis yan lag ma nyams 'das// brjod 
10b7(rgyud 'grel): nas rdo rje spro ba ni// rdzogs nas rab tu bsdu bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// don dam pa yi bzlas par bshad// phra mo'i rnal 'byor bzlas pa yang // ci 'dod par ni rnam gnyis bya// slar yang 
10b8(rgyud 'grel): sngags pas bdag nyid ni// de bzhin nyid la gzhug par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor gnas pa 'di// lha mos bdag po ma mthong bas// tshigs su bcad pa 'di bzhi yis// bde ba chen po bskul bar byed// 
11a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs dga' ba yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la bskyab du gsol// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na 
11a2(rgyud 'grel): sems can yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la bgyes par mdzad du gsol// rdo rje sra khyod bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la pan// sangs rgyas don du byang chub mchog bsgrub rab tu phan par gzigs 
11a3(rgyud 'grel): mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// 'dod chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// khyod ni rdo rje gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba// 'jig rten dag gi 
11a4(rgyud 'grel): dgongs pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// spyod pa dri med kun tu bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod// khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs te dam tshig mchog gi 
11a5(rgyud 'grel): phan don che// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs pa// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par
11a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzod// de ltar yang dag yon tan ni// brjod pas mgon po de bskul nas// mi bskyod la sogs ngo bo yis// de bzhin gshegs pa bstod par mdzad// mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje che// rdo rje dbyings 
11a7(rgyud 'grel): ni mkha' chen po// rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// gsang ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par snang mdzad rab tu dag/ rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal mchog/ 
11a8(rgyud 'grel): ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab// rdo rje nam mkha'i'adi ma med// dngos nyid dag pa gos med pa// gsang ba'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje mi mchi 'dod chags che// me rtogs 
11b1(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha'i rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje dga' ba gdon mi za// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// sangs rgyas ngo bo 
11b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid las byung // rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'khor lo sangs rgyas kyis bstod gsol// mchog tu gsang ba ji bzhin don spyad nas// rang gi 'khor lo la ni 'khor lo gzhug/ 
11b3(rgyud 'grel): mgon po bde ba chen po gcig po bzhugs// da ltar rnal 'byor bzhi byed rnal 'byor pa// hUM gi snying pos 'jig rten rab tu bsgom// de byung 'gro kun rdo rje sems dpar bsam// langs nas 'gro la 
11b4(rgyud 'grel): bltas te ji bzhin spyang par bya// sngags pas ting 'dzin dmigs pa'i tshe// gang tshe lus ni bskams gyur na// lus ngag yid ni tshim byed pa'i// sbyor ba 'di ni bsgom par bya// mtho gang tsam gyis 
11b5(rgyud 'grel): spags pa ru// spyi bor dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// bdud rtsi lnga ni nges 'bebs pa'i// oM ni de ru bsam par bya// rdo rje sbyor ba 'di yis ni// skad cig gis ni gzi can 'gyur// lus ngag yid ni 
11b6(rgyud 'grel): bde ba dag/ thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// de ltar slob pa'i sngags pa yis// sbyangs dang de bzhin rtogs sngar bya// lkog ma snying ga legs sbyangs shing // de bzhin gshegs rnams tshim par 
11b7(rgyud 'grel): bya// rmugs legs par sbyangs byas la// yi ge a yis rtogs byas te// ma gyis mnananas drang ba bya// 'di ni 'azas snang bya ba'o// dang po mthun pa'i mtshams bsam pa// der ni d+hIHlas byung ba yi// pad+ma 'dab ma 
11b8(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa bsgom// ste ba'i nang du yi ge r+tha// thulas skyes pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga par bsam// rtse mo dbuma'i steng du ni// oM bas malkog ma sbyang ba'o// sprin gyi sprin snying ga bsam// rtse gsum mon 
12a1(rgyud 'grel): de la spro// der ni bza' ba sreg pa dag/ 'di ni nang gi sbyin sreg yin// rlung gis me ni sbar byed pa// der ni tshwa gang 'tshed par byed// dbang chen dkyil 'khor gnas su ni// 
12a2(rgyud 'grel): gang du me ni nA bdag/ baba' ba dang ni btung ba rnams// gang ci yang rung chu kyil 'khor// bza' ba kha yi pad+ma las// snying ga'i pad+mar yang dag gzhug/ lte ba'i dkyil 'khor phyin 'og tu/ 
12a3(rgyud 'grel): kha sbyar ba yi sbyor ba yi// gsang ba'i pad+ma las byung ba// bal ba'i mthar ni rnam par brtags// rims dang med cing nad kyang med// dug la sogs pas mi mchil// de ni dus min 'chi mi 'gyur// 
12a4(rgyud 'grel): 'tsho ba thams cad rnam 'joms pa'o// rdo rje phreng ba dpal mchog srub shing gis// gsang 'dus sras chu'i rgya mtsho bsrub pa las// sgrub pa'i yan lag bdud rtsi gang thob des// 'di rten ma lus 
12a5(rgyud 'grel): med mung zab shog/ sgrub pa'i thabs mdor byas pa slob dpon pa grub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po An t+ya shwat+ta ka ra la ma dang // nus chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de na chen bzang pos 
12a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// / rnal 'byor chen po'i chud dpa la gsang ba 'dus pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa'i thabs med dang bsres pa slob dpon gru sbubs kyis mdzad pas 
12a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gang sad du/ shrI guHsa mA dza ma cwa la ga tam+b+ha su te gam sA d+han s+ya su rtse me ba la ka rA ma/ bod gad du/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rlud dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa'i bsgom 
12a8(rgyud 'grel): khas pa da dang bsres pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems pa la phyag 'tshal la// nam 'byed chen mo ba chud dpe la gsang pa 'dus pa lardo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa'i sgrub pa la rab tu 'jug pa rnams kyi bskyed 
12b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin nges par bya ba'i phyir mdo dang bsres pa zhes bya ba le'u bcu bdun pa las bdus te bsdu bar bya'o// de la sgrub pa pos ji skad du le'u bcu gnyis pa las/ dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs 
12b2(rgyud 'grel): ni// me tog 'bras bu sogs pas brgyad// ri bo dben pa'i sa phyogs su// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa 'grub ces bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig gi tshul gyis rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su 
12b3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug ste/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de le'u gsum pa las/ nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni// 
12b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer sprin gyi tshogs chen po// sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan// 'od zer sna lngas kun du khyab// kun nas yongs su zlum po ste// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis brgyan// mchod pa rnam pa lngas 
12b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa// mdor na de ltar bsgoms nas su// gzugs ni dbus su sgom par bya zhes mdor bsdus te gsungs pa de la dang po kho na byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i gzugs can zhes bya ba skyed par bya ba ste/ 
12b6(rgyud 'grel): le'u bco lnga pa las/ rnam par snang mdzad 'od 'dra zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// sangs rgyas rdo rje gsum 'dzin 'gyur zhes gsungs pa 'dis rdo rje 'chang chen po sku mdog dkar por bdag nyid ji lta ba 
12b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin mos par bya'o// de nas le'u dang po las/ ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa'i tshul gyis mi bskyod pa bskyed pas rjes su zhugs pas zhe sdang rdo rjer gyur nas le'u bcu gsum pa 
12b8(rgyud 'grel): las/ khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes// gsod la rtag tu brtson pa dag/ sgrub pa mchog gi chos can la// gsod pa'i don gyis 'grub par 'gyur zhes gsungs pas yi ge hUM ring po las khro bo 
13a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po bcu byung la/ le'u bcu bzhi pa las/ oM suM b+ha zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyis khro bo'i rgyal lo gnod mdzes la bka' bsgobs phyogs bcu'i bgegs kyi 
13a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bkug nas le'u bcu gsum pa las/ yid ma bcas pa rdzogs nas kyang // sngags kyi gnas ni bsrung bar bya// bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di la ni// gnas nas sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob// rdo rje bdud 
13a3(rgyud 'grel): rtse rgyal chen po// rdo rje phur bu rnam par bsgom// me stag 'bar ba 'dra ba yis// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor gdab par bya// zhes gsungs pa 'dis khro bo bdud rtsi thal sbyor gyi phur bu rnams kyis 
13a4(rgyud 'grel): oM g+ha g+ha zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyis gnod mdzes la bka' bsgo ste phur bu gdab bo// de nas 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i sngags kyis rdo rje rab bsam pa dang / b+h+rUM mdzad kyis rdo rje'i dra ba yi ge hUM gis sa'i 
13a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bsam zhing yi ge gsum gyis go cha la sogs pa bya'o// de ltar phyogs dang mtshams bcing ba dang rab la sogs pa'i cho ga bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsgoms la le'u gnyis pa las/ dngos po 
13a6(rgyud 'grel): med pa sgom pa'i dngos// bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min// de ltar dngos po dngos med pa// bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o zhes tshigs su bcad pa'i don gyis stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du sgom mo// de nas le'u 
13a7(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa las/ dkyil 'khor rdo rje kun las skyes// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus su sgom zhes bya ba la sogs pa/ gsungs pas/ rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi bskyed nas/ bsdu ba dag kyang rab tu byanas 
13a8(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la sogs pas sa'i cha bskyed pa/ le'u bcugacig pa las la ge ts+tsha byi gnas bsgob ste zhes bya bas gnas yas khang bsams la/ der le'u dang po las/ gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan/ de bzhin 
13b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa kun gyis gnas zhes gsungs pa 'dis sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba la sogs pa'i gdan gyis brgyadan la le'u brgyad pa las dpag tsha dbye ba'i khyon tsam la/ gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa yis// mchod 
13b2(rgyud 'grel): rten rin chen sna bzhi pa// gsal zhing rang bzhin drim med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bzhugs nas ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom mo// gnas ni bskyed pa sngon 'gro 
13b3(rgyud 'grel): bas// rdo rje gsum bskyed bsgom par bya zhes gsungs pas lhag par mos pa can gyi sems kyis bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang nyid du gyur nas/ dbus kyi gdan la sems pa'i skyil mo krung gis gnas par bsams 
13b4(rgyud 'grel): nas le'adung pa las/ gsal ba de yi ngo bo nyid// sna chags gzugs kyis kun du khyab// sangs rgyas chags kyis kun tu rgyas// 'od zer 'gro ba mang po 'khrug ces gsungs pa 'dis dkyil 'khor 
13b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi'akhor lo bkod pa'i ting 'dzin gyis dbang du byas te lhag par mos pa la dmigs pa bstan pa yin no// da ni rnal 'byor bzhi'i rom pa tsam par bya sted la le'u bdun pa las/ dam tshig wa byung chog bzhin/ 
13b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu 'dod pas bzung bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad nas// dngos grub rab mchog thob par 'gyur zhes gsungs pa 'dis lhag par mas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo 
13b7(rgyud 'grel): bkod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phung po la sogs par bsdus te/ gzugs phung rtogs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs la/ le'u gsum pa las/ oM shUn+ya tA zhes bya 
13b8(rgyud 'grel): bal sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa'o// le'u brgyad pa las/ nam mkha' dbyings kyis dbus gnas par// ye shes rgya mtsho bsgob par bya zhes gsungs pa 'dis// ye shes 
14a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho'i gzugs yongs su gyur nas/ de nas ldang bar gyur pa ni ye shes rgya mtsho las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang de'i steng du pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa 
14a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i steng du yi ge gsum bkod de/ de thams cad bsdus te zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra bar yongs su gyur par ltas la/ de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi bro ba sems can gyi khams rnams ye shes kyi bdag nyid 
14a3(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du rjes su bcug la le'u gsum pa las/ oM d+har+m+ma d+hA tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyis brtan par bya ba 'di ni rnal 'byor te// de bas na ye shes tsam la snyoms
14a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa// rnal 'byor yin par shes par bya zhes gsungs pa yin no// de la le'u bcu gcig pa las// rdo rje mchog gsum yi ge sngags// phyag rgya chen por rnam bsgom pa// byang chub thams cad 
14a5(rgyud 'grel): thob bya'i phyir// ye shes rdo rje dag gi bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge gsum bkod la// rdo rje nga rgyal de las byung ba// rdo rje 'chang chen por bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin 
14a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa ni rjes su rnal 'byor ro// de nas le'u dang po las gsungs pa'i rig pa'i skyes bu gzugs can ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi sems can gyi don bya bar mi nus pas na le'u brgyad pa las/ nu ma'i bar nas klad 
14a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyas par du/ cho ga shes pas rkang mthil bar du dgod// lte ba skyed pa gsang ba rgyal ba'i sras// rigs lnga rnams ni dgod par rab tu bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs
14a8(rgyud 'grel): pas phung po la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ye shes kyi rang bzhin lus la rjes su zhugs par bya'o// de bas na le'u bcu bdun pa las// phung po lnga ni mdor bsdus na// sangs rgyas lngar ni 
14b1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu bsgrags// rdo rje skye mched nyid dag kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog ces gsungs pa yin no// da ni sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la rjes su zhugs pas zhal gsum lta bus gdul bya 
14b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis don du rdo rje 'chang gi bdag nyid du bsgom par bya'o// don 'di nyid bstan pa ni le'u dang po las/ rig pa'i skyes bu chen po'i gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po sngags kyis byin gyis 
14b3(rgyud 'grel): brlabs so// byin gyis brlabs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsum pa lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to zhes gsungs pa ni 
14b4(rgyud 'grel): shin tu rnal 'byor ro// de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rjes su zhugs pas sul sogs pa'i rim pa 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de la rim pa ni 'di yin te le'u bcu pa 
14b5(rgyud 'grel): las// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// hUM zhes bya ba rab tu bsgom// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ yi ge oM ni rnam par bsam// chos kyi dkyil lakhor dbus gnas par // yi ge sa zhes rnam par bsam 
14b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsungs pa 'dis mgo bo dang lkog ma dang snying ga'i phyogs su yi ge gsum rnam par bkod la de las byung ba'i spyan la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis sku rdo rje la sogs pa bkug la le'u bcu gnyis pa las/ sangs 
14b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas su 'dzin dpal dang ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis gsol pa btab pa la rjes su zhugs nas le'u bdun pa las/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 
14b8(rgyud 'grel): tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis rigs gsum gyi bdag nyid can du rgyal bskyed la le'u drug pa las/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab po// le'u dang / 
15a1(rgyud 'grel): po las/ rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa'i tshul gyis bskyed pa ni dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya'o// de nas le'u bcu gnyis pa las/ rnam pa mchog
15a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun ldan pa'i// snying gar ye shes dam tshig dang // dbu rgyan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes 'gyur ba// 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin te// dngos grub thams cad 'grub 
15a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchog/ dam tshig mchog gi rab tu bya zhes gsungs pa 'dis// dam tshig sems dpa'i snying gar ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon gyis/ dgug pa dang / dbu rgyan la rang gi bdag po bsgom mo// de nas 
15a4(rgyud 'grel): le'u bcu gcig pa las/ snying gar yi ge hUM bsams nas sems ni thig ler gyur par bzhag/ ces gsungs pa 'dis ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar yang snying po yi ge hUM ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' 
15a5(rgyud 'grel): sgom mo// 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi go 'phang ni 'dod chags las skye bar 'gyur bar rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ le'u dang po las/ 'dod chags chen po'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
15a6(rgyud 'grel): par zhugs par mdzad pa de bzhin du bskyed bzhin pa la gnas pas dang po'i sbyor ba bya ste/ 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'dod pas thar pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ le'u bcu bdun pa las/ 
15a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa thams cad longs spyod pa'i zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes gsungs pa'i rim pa 'dis le'u bco lnga pa las gsungs pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i gdol pa'i bu mo legs par bslabs 
15a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'am/ yang na rang gi snying ga nas phyung ste mdun du bzhag la le'u brgyad pa las/ nu ma'i bar nas klad pa'i rgyas kyi bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i rigs lnga dang bsre ba byas la rdo rje dang pad+ma mngon par 
15b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dus byas pas dbang po gnyis kyis snyoms par 'jug pa bya ste/ le'u bdun pa las ji skad du/ bud med gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba// lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la// byin gyis
15b2(rgyud 'grel): brlabs kyi gnas gsum gyis// dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i mchog/ spyan la sogs pa bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// sangs 
15b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// oM zhes pa dang AHzhes pas// hUM dang phaT ru rnam par brtag/ 'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yi// pad+ma rdo rje bsgom par bya zhes gsungs pa 'dis// tha mal pa'i nga 
15b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal spangs la// chags shing chags pa'i lta bas lta// 'di ni dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba 'dis thabs kyi rdo rje gnyis par bya zhing / rin chen 'byung ldan gyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas le'u drug pa 
15b5(rgyud 'grel): las gsungs pa'i rjes su chags pa'i sngags brjod la 'khyud pa dang 'o bya ba dang / gzhib pa la sogs pa byas la yi ge hUM gi glu len cing las la gnas par bsgom mo// 'byin pa'i skabs su phaT ces brjod 
15b6(rgyud 'grel): la// byang chub kyi sems kyi rdul phra rab de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i 'byung gnas su bsgom la sngar bshad pa'i gzhal yas khang na gnas par bya'o// de nas don yod pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas le'u 
15b7(rgyud 'grel): drug pa las gsungs pa'i mchod pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs te gzhung 'di dag gis ni dkyil 'khor gsum sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can te/ bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa dang po'i sbyor ba zhes bya 
15b8(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir le'u dang po las gsungs pa'i ye shes sngon ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa'i tshul gyis mi bskyod pa phyung la des zhe sdang la spyod pa'i 
16a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams yang dag par sbyangs la de bkug nas rang gi lus la bcug na zhe sdang rdo rjer 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams phyung nas de rnams kyis gti 
16a2(rgyud 'grel): mug la sogs pa la rjes su dga' ba'i sems can rnams yang dag par sbyangs nas bsdus te/ ye shes kyi 'khor le rjes su bcug la slar bkug ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod nas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa 'di ni 
16a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa'o// de nas le'u gsum pa las/ rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa// yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam// sna yi rtse mor nan tan du// rnal 'byor rigs pas rtag 
16a4(rgyud 'grel): tu bsgom zhes bya ba la sogs pa phra mo'i sbyor ba'o// le'u bdun pa las/ slong mo za zhing mi bzlas te// ma spangs pa la chags mi bya// 'dod pa kun las longs spyod cing // sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams 
16a5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas/ zhes gsungs pa la sogs pas rdo rje bzlas pa dran par bya ste/ le'u bcu gsum pa las rjod nas rdo rje'i spro ba ni/ rdzogs nas rab tu bsdu bar bya zhes bya ba ngag gi bzlas brjod byas la nye bar bsdu 
16a6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ste le'u bcu bdun pa las/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mos de bzhin gshegs pa
16a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la dga' bas bstod pas zhes bya ba 'di thams cad bya ste/ bdag po rang nyid don dam pa'i bden pa la zhugs pa la de nas spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis rab tu bskul 
16a8(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis/ mi bskyod pa ni ye shes che zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rnams kyi mngon par bstod pas yang dag par bsad par bya ste/ cho ga bzhin legs par mchod nas rang gi skul 
16b1(rgyud 'grel): legs par gzhug par bya'o// de nas le'u bcu pa las/ nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de yi dbus gnas yi ge hUM// rang gi gzugs su rab tu brtag
16b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'od zer rab tu 'bar// rnam par 'phro bar bsam par bya// sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gsung thugs// snying la de yis rnam bsgom la// de ma thag tu de 'gyur ba// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin// zhes
16b3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa 'dis yi ge hUM gis nam+ba kha'i khams yongs su gang ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du rnam par bsam la nye bar bsdu bar bya'o// de ltar las dang po pa rnams rab tu 'jug pa'i dam tshig dang sdom 
16b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pas tha mal pa'i nga rgyal dang bral bas/ thun bzhir lha'i rnal 'byor goms pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ las kyi rab tu dbye ba rnams kyang 
16b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// rim pa 'di nyid kyis le'u bcu bdun pa las/ lus kyi rdo rje kha zas dang // phyi rol rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // rdo rje chos la rtag par ni// sngags ston cho ga spyad par bya zhes gsungs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dis 
16b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i thabs las bshad pa'i rim pas kha zas sbyang ba dang / lkog ma sbyang ba dang / snying ga sbyang ba dag byas nas bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i zas kyi bya ba dag kyang bya'o// de nas le'u bcu pa las sngags kyi 
16b7(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu ji snyed pa// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes rdzogs// dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis// dngos po thams cad brtag par bya zhes gsungs pa 'dis rdo rje dang pad+ma yang dag par sbyar bas zhi ba la sogs pa'i
16b8(rgyud 'grel): las thams cad rab tu bsgrub pa'i yi ge gsum gyi sngags dang phreng ba'i sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman dang nang gi sbyin sreg gis kyang las thams cad rab tu bslab par bya ste/ 'di ni las kyi 
17a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa'o// de ltar mdo dang bsres pa rgyas par bstan nas/ da ni mdor bsdus nas bshad par bya ste/ de la thog mar gnas nges pa dang / snying rje 
17a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po la dmigs pa dang / bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pa dang / stong pa nyid la dmigs pa dang / sa'i cha skyed pa dang / gzhal yas khang dang / dkyil 'khor dgod pa dang / don dam pa'i dkyil 
17a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la 'jug pa dang / ldang ba dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa dang / mthar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / rdo rje 'chang chen po bskyed pa dang / sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pas 
17a4(rgyud 'grel): phung po la sogs pa dgang ba dang / sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / ldan pa'i 'dus byas pa dang / rdo rje dang pad+ma 'dus byas pa dang / rjes su chags pa'i rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa 
17a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / dkyil 'khor phyung ba dang / phra mo'i sbyor ba dang / rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang / ngag gi bzlas pa dang / don dam pa la zhugs pa dang / rab tu bskul bas bslang ba dang / bstod pa byed pa dang / nye bar bsdu ba
17a6(rgyud 'grel): dang las kyi rab tu dbye ba rnams su shes par bya'o// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i skyed rim gyis sgrub pa'i thabs mdo dang bsres pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas/ mdzad 
17a7(rgyud 'grel): pardzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA shrI b+ha d+ha dang lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon gru sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o// 
17a8(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza man+da la bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// thog ma dbus mtha' las 
17b1(rgyud 'grel): grol ba'i// khyab bdag stong pa bzhi'i rang bzhin// mgon po rdo rje sems dpa' la// btud nas dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du// ji srid phreng ba chu la sogs// de srid 
17b2(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i man ngag mtha'// dbang bskur ba ni cho ga bzhin// bla ma'i rgyud rim las 'ongs pa// rnal 'byor rnam gnyis mthar thug pa'i// bla ma'i lung ni nges thob pa// bshad rgyud bzhi'i dgongs pa shes// bskyed 
17b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang ni rdzogs pa yi// rim pa gnyis kyi don shes dang // mchog dang thun mong sgrub la gnas// dam tshig sdom la gnas pa ste// rtsa ba'i ltung ba spangs dang ldan// bzod ldan brang la g.yo rgyu med// brtan bzhin 
17b4(rgyud 'grel): dul ba blo gros ldan// sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes// de nyid bcu ni yongs shes shing // dkyil 'khor 'dri dang rab gnas mkhas// nyan thos rnams kyi lam 'gro min// pha rol phyin bcu'i tshul la gnas// 
17b5(rgyud 'grel): zab cing rgya che'i chos la mos// bden gnyis la ni rnam par mkhas// bla med theg pa gtsor byed pa// 'gro ba'i don spyod snying rje can// rin chen skyes bur gang gyur pas// sngon du bsten pa byas nas su// de nas 
17b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// gang zhig yid 'ong gnas su ni// dri bzang tsan+dan sogs kyis byug/ dri zhim me tog mchog bkram nas// shar phyogs su ni kha bltas la// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gnas te/ 
17b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba yi// 'gro la ban dang bskyab pa'i phyir// snying rje chen pos dmigs par bya// bka' yi 'khor lo sngon 'gro ba'i// bsnyen dang nyer sgrub sgrub pa dang // sgrub chen la ni mkhas pa yis// sbyor 
17b8(rgyud 'grel): ba gsum gyi mthar thug pas// rdo rje bzlas dang rjes mthun par// ngag gi bzlas pa'i tshul nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor gtso bo'i 'bum du bzlas// de las gzhan pa'i khri ru bzlas// mtshan mo nges 
18a1(rgyud 'grel): par thob pa'am// yang na bsnyen pa'i sbyor goms pas// dkyil 'khor yongs su bri bar bya// de la dkyil 'khor cho ga ni// yan lag rnam b+he nyi shu ste// sa gzhi sbrang dang byin brlab dang // yongs 
18a2(rgyud 'grel): bzung dang bsrung ba dang // sa yi lha dang dkyil 'khor dang // bum pa rnams dang slob ma dag/ sta gon du ni gnas pa dang // thig gdab pa yi cho ga dang // de bzhin rdul tshon dgye ba dang // dkyil 'khor byin gyis 
18a3(rgyud 'grel): brlab pa dang // de la mchod pa'i bye brag dang // slob dpon bdag nyid 'jug pa dang // de bzhin slob ma gzhug pa dang // bum pa'i dbang dang gsang ba dang // shes rab ye shes dbang dang ni// de bzhin du ni 
18a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa dang // rab gnas dang ni sbyin sreg ste// dkyil 'khor gyi ni yan lag mchog/ 'di dag cho ga nyi shu'o// de la re zhig dang por dkyil 'khor bri bar mngon par 'dod pa'i sa'i cha'i dbus su mnAl gru bzhi khru 
18a5(rgyud 'grel): gang pa bya ste/ me tog sil ma bkram la lha'i gnas dang gdan ji lta ba bzhin bsam ste/ bla ma dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed la/ ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang / gzhug 
18a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bcing ba dang / mnyes par byas te/ byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i mthar thug par bya zhing / de la phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod de/ bstod pa tshul bzhin byas la/ dgongs 
18a7(rgyud 'grel): shig dus gsum mgon po rnams// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa dang // slob ma rnams la sman slad du// bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// dkyil 'khor dam pa bri 
18a8(rgyud 'grel): bar 'tshal// rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis// bdag la byin gyis brlab du gsol lan gsum brjod de gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas phyogs skyong rnams rang rang gi gnas su ji lta ba bzhin bskyed 
18b1(rgyud 'grel): la dza hUM baM hoHphyag bzhis dgugs pa la sogs pa tshul bzhin du byas te/ mchod yon dang / zhal bsil dang / zhabs bsil dang / spos dang / me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa lngas mchod de/ kha zas spang ba'i ting nge 
18b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gyis gtor ma byin gyis brlabs te/ oM in+d+ra ye swA hA/ oM ya mA ye swA hA/ oM ba ru Na ye swA hA/ oM ku be ra ye swA hA/ oM ag+na ye swA hA/ oM ne re ti rAk+Sha ti b+ha ye swA hA/ oM ba ya be swA hA/ oM I shA na ye swA hA/ 
18b3(rgyud 'grel): oM sUr+ya ye swA hA/ oM tsan+d+ra di bya sA hA/ oM pri thai b+ha ye swA hA/ zhes pas gtor ma dbul lo// oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Ar+ya nut+pa tan+na trad oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ zhes lan gsum bzlas pas mnyes par bya ste/ khams 
18b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum gnas pa'i lha dang grwa// gnod sbyin dri za lha ma yin// gang dag rdzu 'phrul cher ldan rnams// rdo rje'i spyan dang snyan mnga' ba// sa la gnas pa'i 'byung po kun// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis// sangs rgyas 
18b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams la mchod pa dang // sems can rnams la phan don du// sa phyogs dge gnas 'di nyid du// dam pa'i dkyil 'khor cher 'byung ba// ji ltar bsams pa'i las byed na// khyed kyis bar chad ma byed par// dge ba'i 
18b6(rgyud 'grel): grogs po nyid du mdzod// de ltar khyed la dag gis ni// bzod pa gsol gyis ma bslabar// rmi lam la sogs mtshan ma rnams// nyes legs ltas rnams bstan du gsol// zhes lan gsum brjod la gsol ba 
18b7(rgyud 'grel): gdab par bya'o// de nas lcogs na las thams cad pa'i thab khung der dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas mi rus kyi phye ma las gnod mdzes kyi sngags kyis bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya 
18b8(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir sbyin sreg bya'o// mi lcogs na las thams cad pa'i sngags kyi chus bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya'o// de nas ji ltar brtags pa'i dbus su las thams cad par byin gyis brlabs pa'i las kyi rdo rje g.yas bskor dul+la 
19a1(rgyud 'grel): thabs su brko/ zhogs ma dang sol du ma dang / rus pa dang / so pag la sogs pa'i skyon bsal la/ sman lnga dang ni rin po che lnga dang // 'bru lnga blugs la dri zhim zhim bsdam pa'i sas bkang la 
19a2(rgyud 'grel): gru bzhi lham par sa gzhi mthas par byas la bko tsam du ba'i lci bsal ma srung bas byug go// dri zhim po'i chus kyang byug ste/ me tog sil ma dgram pa ni phyi'i snang ba'o// de'i steng du sbyor ba gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin 
19a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par bsgoms pa'i mthar gnod mdzes kyi sngags kyis bgegs bskrad pa ni nang gis sbyang ba'o// 'di dag ni sa sbyang ba'i cho ga'o// de nas hUM kha hUM zhes pas rnam par dag pa'i nam mkha' bsam nas/ de nas 
19a4(rgyud 'grel): hUM suM hUM zhes pas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i rin po che sna bzhi'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab bskyed la/ de'i steng du dz+wa la hUM zhes pas gser gyis gzhi gru bzhi pa la rdo rje phreng bas brgyan par bsam mo// de'i steng du rdo rje thal mo 
19a5(rgyud 'grel): bcings pas kha sbu ba la/ oM badz+ra me di ni badz+ri b+ha ba ban+d+ha hUM zhes pas de dag byin gyis brlab bo// de nas sbyor ba gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa 'di ni sa gzhi byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga'o// de nas yang bdag 
19a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang po'i sbyor bas zhe sdang rdo rjer bsgoms la/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi phyogs bzhin gnas pa'i las kyi rdo rje bzhi dngos su'am sems kyis bsams kyang rung ste/ dkyil 'khor/ 
19a7(rgyud 'grel): chen po bri bar gsol bar gdab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// mtshan rnams thams cad 
19a8(rgyud 'grel): yang dag rdzogs// mtshan min thams cad rnam spangs pa// kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// zhi ba'i chos ni mchog la byung // ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba// kun tu 
19b1(rgyud 'grel): bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med// kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// 
19b2(rgyud 'grel): de ltar lan gsum du gsol ba btab nas/ bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje khro bo chen po bsgoms te/ mig g.yas g.yon du ma dang Ta las nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms te/ de'i dbus su mig 'bras hUM las 
19b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'i rdo rje nag po de las 'od zer gyi snang ba phyogs bcur 'phros pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad tu khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyis khyab par sprul par bya'o// rkang pa gnyis la a las sna tshogs rdo rje 'od 'bar ba 
19b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms la lag pa g.yas g.yon du rdo rje dang dril bu 'gying bag can du 'dzin pas dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams te/ stang stabs kyis g.yas gong bar bya'o// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod cing bskor ro// su gsung thugs 
19b5(rgyud 'grel): kye rdo rje can// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson// bdag na dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor gyis// lha dang lha dbang gsang ba pa// brjed byed la sogs bgegs kyi tshogs// sa 'dir ma gnas
19b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du dengs// gal te dam tshig las 'das na// rdo rje khro bo bzhin 'bar ba'i// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba yis// mgo ni tshal pa brgyar gshog cing // zhig par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// zhes brjod nas sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang 
19b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du byin gyis brlab bo// de nas seng ldeng gi bur pa la dri dmar pos byugs shing srang bu dmar po dang me tog gi phreng ba brtags pa bstod zhal gsum phyag drug pa smad zur gsum rtse gcig par byin gyis brlab 
19b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'am/ yang na bka'i 'khor lo'i sbyor bas phur bu gdab par bya'o// 'di dag ni sa yongs su bzung ba'i cho ga'o// // de nas gnod mdzes dang 'dod pa'i rgyal pos/ ra ba dang dra bas phyogs bsrung zhing bcing
20a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// 'di dag des bsrung ba'i cho ga'o// // de nas mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgyas gnon du byas pas dkyil 'khor gyi sa la bzhag ste/ oM Tak+ki hUM dzaHzhes brjod pas sa'i lha mo sku mdog ser mo 
20a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad kyis mtshan pa/ lag pa na gser gyi bum pa 'dzin pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus nas 'thon par bsams te/ de la 'di skad du/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams
20a3(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang // sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis// ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa// de bzhin bdag gi bdud kyi sde// pham par byas
20a4(rgyud 'grel): te dkyil 'khor bri// zhes lan gsum du gsol ba gdab bo// de nas mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang / mchod pa phul te bzod par gsol to// de nyid du thim par bsam mo// de dag ni sa'i lha mo sta gon du 
20a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i cho ga'o// // de nas bdud rtsi lnga dang dri zhim po'i chus lha'i grangs dang mthun pa'i rigs so so'i thig le byas la/ gdan dang gzhal ya ma khang ji lta ba bzhin bsams la/ phyag rgya dang gnyis su med pa'i 
20a6(rgyud 'grel): khyad par las dam tshig gi 'khor lo rdzogs par bkod la/ ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas te/ ji lta ba bzhin du byin gyis brlab pa byas la/ phyi nang gsang 
20a7(rgyud 'grel): ba gsum gyi mchod pas mchod cing bstod pa byas te/ gsol ba lan gsum du gdab par bya'o// lag pas bdug spos blangs nas pus mos la btsugs te 'di skad du/ bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog/ rigs sngags 
20a8(rgyud 'grel): rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje bdag nyid can dag gi/ dkyil 'khor bdag nyid kyi bar 'tshal// slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang // byed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// bcom ldan padag ni gus pa la// don 
20b1(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad pa'i rigs// sangs rgyas 'gro 'khor bya don rtsol// byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang // gzhan yang gsang sngags lha rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang // gang yang 'byung po mthu 
20b2(rgyud 'grel): chen dang // gang yang rdo rje spyan mnga' ba'i// sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis// rdo rje 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ni// yo byad ci 'byor pas 'drin// deng bdag slob mar bcas pa 
20b3(rgyud 'grel): la// thugs ni rtse bar dgongs nas su// tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du// byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol// de ltar lan gsum du gsol ba btab la mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas ra ba dang dra bas phyogs 
20b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams bcing ba byas te/ 'di dag ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha sta gon du gnas pa'i cho ga'o// // de nas gser la sogs pa'am/ sa'i khams kyi rgyu las byas pa'i bum pa lto ba che ba mgrin pa ring ba kha khyer dang ldan zhing mchu 'byang ba 
20b5(rgyud 'grel): nag nog med pa lha'i grangs dang mthun par byas te/ tsan+dan dkar pos byugs shing pad+ma la sogs pa'i gdan la so so rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa bri/ ras kha tshar ma nyams pas mgul pa bcings la tsu ta la sogs pa'i 'bras bu 
20b6(rgyud 'grel): can gyi shing gi kha brgyan pa sngags kyis btab pa dri zhim po'i chus gang ba/ gro dang nas dang til dang 'bras so ba dang mon sran dre'u ste 'bru lnga dang / b+hu ru dang sa le sbram dang / dung dang mu tig dang / nor bu ste rin po che lnga dang / sai ha dang / 
20b7(rgyud 'grel): byA gri dang / ha sa dang / ha sa de ba dang / kar ni ka ste sman lnga blugs la/ me tog gi phreng bas bcings pa'i rdo rje khar bzhag ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i ting 'dzin la gnas la bzlas pa bya/ yi ge baM las gyur pa'i gser gyi bum 
20b8(rgyud 'grel): pa bsgoms la/ hrIHlas gyur pa'i pad+ma dang / aM dang a las gyur pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma'i gdan la rang rang gi sa bon yongs su gyur pa las sku rdzogs pa la ye shes kyi 'khor lo bkug la bstim par bya ste/ mchod yon dang / 
21a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa lnga phul la/ gtor ma yang kha zas sbyang ba'i ting nge 'dzin du byas la/ thun mtshams bzhi ru phul nas so so'i bzlas pas mnyes par bya'o// de yang g.yas su rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa bzhag ste/ 
21a2(rgyud 'grel): mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin du bya'o// g.yon du las thams cad pa'i bum pa bzhag la mchod pa dang / bzlas pas mnyes par byas nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs bsal du gsol zhes 'phrin las bcol lo// dkyil 'khor la 
21a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa yang bya ste/ snga ma bzhin du gsol ba gdab pa yang lan gsum du bya'o// 'di dag ni bum pa sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o// de nas phyi rol tu byung nas rang gi slob ma brtags la bzung bar bya ste/ blo dang ldan pa theg 
21a4(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po la dga' ba bla mal dad cing snying rje che ba/ bka' drin rjes su dran pa nga rgyal med pa bslab pa yid ches pa dang ldan pa/ gsang sngags bsgrub pa dang / slob dpon la lhag par mos pa rigs dang ldan zhing sdom pa dang dam tshig la/ 
21a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa ni rin po che'i skyes bu zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/ 'di ni brtan pas mchog tu bzung bar rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs so// de las gzhan pa'i slob ma ni dad pa sngon du 'gro bas byang chub la dmigs nas/ dkyil 'khor 
21a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi lha dang bla ma la dad pa rgya chen po byed pa yang ci rigs par bzung bar bya ste/ gang zag gi rim pa bzhin sbyar ro// de las gzhan pa ni slob ma dang tshogs pa'i bdag nyid gang dang yang mi ldan pa de ni 'dir mi snang zhing dgag par bya'o// 
21a7(rgyud 'grel): de ltar snod dang snod ma yin pa rnams brtags la slob dpon bdag nyid khang pa'i nang du 'jug go// de nas skal pa dang ldan pa'i slob mas kyang sgo drung du gnas te/ dga' chen byed bdag ston pa bas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su 
21a8(rgyud 'grel): gsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul brtan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol// byang chub sems ni bdag la gsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyabs gsum 
21b1(rgyud 'grel): dag kyang bdag la gsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon pos bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal// de ltar lan gsum gsol ba btab nas/ slob dpon 'khor lo'i gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas tshig
21b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dis gnang ba sbyin te/ bu tshur theg pa chen po yi// gsang sngags spyod yul cho ga dag/ khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te// dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// sku gsung thugs/ 
21b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi rdo rje can// rdo rje gsang sngags bsgoms pa yis// dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du// thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes// gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de// shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis// bdud sde shin/ 
21b4(rgyud 'grel): tu mi bzad pa// dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom// 'jig rten rjes 'jug par rtogs nas// 'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das// de bas kun mkhyen thob bya phyir// bu yis blo gros 'di byos shig/ ces smra'o// 
21b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang // sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang / yongs su bsngo ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / bdag nyid lus dbul ba dang / 
21b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang / mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes sdom pa bzung ba dang / smon lam gdab par bya'o// dkon mchog 
21b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa ni slob mas tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing bya'o// sdom pa bzung ba ni dang po slob dpon gyi bsgo ste/ 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// dkon mchog gsum la 
21b8(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su song // 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag/ blo chen khyod kyis bzung ba gyis// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// shes rab dril bu zhes grags so// slob dpon 
22a1(rgyud 'grel): dag kyang bzung bar gyis// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// 'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs// rin chen rigs mchog chen po la// nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du// zang 
22a2(rgyud 'grel): zing mi 'jigs tshes dang byams// sbyin pa rnam bzhi dag tu sbyin// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam chos khyod kyis bzung bar gyis// 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs// las
22a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du bzung bar bya// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya// srog chags rnams ni bsad mi bya// ma byin par yang mi blang ngo // 'dod chags dag kyang
22a4(rgyud 'grel): mi bya zhing // rdzun du smra bar mi bya'o// nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba ste// chang ni rnam par spang bar bya// sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs par// bya ba ma yin thams cad spangs// dam pa nye bar brten bya zhing // rnal 'byor pa 
22a5(rgyud 'grel): kun bsnyen bkur bya// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum bya// ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni// ci nus par yang rjes su bsrung // sems can don la mi phyogs dang // theg pa dman la dgod mi 
22a6(rgyud 'grel): bya// 'khor ba dag kyang yongs mi spangs// rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags// lha dang lha min gsang ba pa// de la brnyas par mi bya zhing // phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang // mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya'o// de ltar dam tshig 
22a7(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa dag/ blo ldan khyod kyis rtag tu bsrungs// de nas bla ma des gsungs pa'i// sdom pa legs par bzung bya'o// chags 'gyur las/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams 
22a8(rgyud 'grel): cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems 
22b1(rgyud 'grel): ni bla med pas// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi zer/ tshul khrims kyi ni brlab pa dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum// bdag gis brtan por bzung bar bgyi// sangs rgyas
22b2(rgyud 'grel): chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i bkon mchog gsum// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i// sdom pa deng nas bzung bar bgyi// rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag/ yang dag nyid du bzung bar 
22b3(rgyud 'grel): bgyi// slob dpon dag kyang bzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la// nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// byang chub chen po las byung ba'i// pad+ma'i rigs 
22b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog chen po la// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam chos so sor gzung bar bgyi// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang 
22b5(rgyud 'grel): ci nus bgyi// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// sems can ma lus don gyi phyir// bdag gi sdom pa ma lus bzung // ma bsgral ba dag bsgral bar bgyi// ma grol ba dag bdag 
22b6(rgyud 'grel): gi sgrol// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing // mya ngan 'das la dgod par bgyi// lus dang ngag dang yid dag gis// mi dge ba ni bcu po dag/ bag med pa ni gnas gyur pa// chang ni rnam par spang bar bya// de bzhin 
22b7(rgyud 'grel): lha dang lha min dang // gsang ba pa dag brnyes pa dang // mtshan ma la sogs 'gom pa rnams// dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni// ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar// bdag ni rab tu ldog par bgyi// de ltar sdom pa bzung ba'i slob 
22b8(rgyud 'grel): mal snying ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral bar rdo rje khu tshur gyis dri'i thig le gsum byas te/ nyi ma dang pad+ma dang / zla ba la yi ge gsum so sor bkod la sku dang gsung dang thugs su byin gyis brlab cing / las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis 
23a1(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bar bya'o// de nas mchod pa byas te/ skye bor me tog dang spos dang / mar me dang dri ni sring gar ro// sgrub shos ni mdun du'o// de re re la yang tshig 'di sngon du 'gro bas sbyir te/ dus 'di nyid 
23a2(rgyud 'grel): nas bzung nas ni// 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos par// mchod pa kun dang ldan pa ni// dus kun tu ni bde bar mnos zhes pas so// de nas las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis/ mngon par sngags pa'i so shing sor brgya 
23a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa shing drang po'o ma can las byung ba srin bus ma zos pa/ brag dang mjed pa med pa drang por byas pa la dri zhim pos byugs shing rtse mo me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i slob ma shar phyogs sul bltas te mi smra bar so shing 
23a4(rgyud 'grel): bca'o// bza' ba zin nas mdun drang por dor ro// de nas so shing gi rtse mo'i bltas lta ste/ phyogs mtshams kyi dbye bas zhi ba la sogs pa'i lhas brgyad 'grub pa 'am/ yang na bdag la lta ba 'am rtse mo gyen du 'greng na 
23a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub mchog 'grub bo// de bzhin du shar du bltas na dngos grub 'bring 'grub bo// mtshams dang byang du bltas na 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub 'grub bo// thur du bltas nas 'og gis dngos grub 'grub bo// de nas ngag 
23a6(rgyud 'grel): ginyes pa sbyangs pa'i phyir 'thor 'thung byas te/ kha bkrus nas hu ba gsum 'thung ngu gzhug pa'i sngags ni/ oM tsi bi shud+d+hA ya sarba d+harmA ya sarba pA ba ne tsa s+ya sho d+ha yA/ sar+b+ba bi ka la baM a pa na ya hUM/ zhes bzlas la chu khyor ba gsum 
23a7(rgyud 'grel): 'thung du bzhug go// 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams// u dra ba ra'i me tog bzhin// brgya lam ni res 'ga' zhig yin// 'byung 'gyur yang na mi 'byung ngo // gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba// de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ 
23a8(rgyud 'grel): gang gis mnyam med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// bskal pa bye ba du ma ru// sdig pa byas par gyur pa gang // de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra ba// mthong bas 'byang bar 'gyur ba yin// grags pa mtha'// 
23b1(rgyud 'grel): yas sngags spyod pa'i// tshul la gnas pa spos ci dgos// skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas nas ni// go 'phangs bla na med par 'gyur// gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la// blo gros shin tu mi g.yo ba// de dag gi ni ngan 'gro'i 
23b2(rgyud 'grel): d+hun// sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu bcad // bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis// rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed// gang byir rgyal bsras bcas la// bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni// bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun// yongs sa 
23b3(rgyud 'grel): khaMzung ste skye bzhin pa// de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la// sang ni rab tu skyo bar 'gyur// theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i// las mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan// khyed rnams der ni dong bas na// rang 'byung skal ba chen po la// 
23b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi// de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba yin// zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di dag ni/ theg pa chen po'i chos bshad pas spro ba yang dag par skyed par bya'o// de nas las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i srung
23b5(rgyud 'grel): sud mdud pa gsum bor ba dpung pa g.yon pa la gdags so// de nas sngags kyis btab pa'i ku sha la sngas dang / stan byas te/ rmi lam gyi bltas lta'o// rmi lam gyi bltas mthong ba dge ba'am mi dge ba nang par dus su 
23b6(rgyud 'grel): la bzlos shig ces bsgo'o// rmi lam mi dge ba na las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis gzhom mo// de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te/ nam mkha'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bkod la// dra ba dang ra bas kha sbyar 
23b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi sbyor bas bsrungs te bzhag go// de dag ni sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o// de nas slob dpon rdo rje sems pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas rang bzhin gyis dkyil 'khor bskul ba'i phyir nam mkha' la gdab pa'i skud pa dang 
23b8(rgyud 'grel): mtshon gyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir sa la gdab pa dang gnyis bya ste/ de la thog mar rang gi phyag rgya ma bslab par 'byongs pa dang thig sud bkal te/ de nas tshon lnga so sor btsos nas bdud rtsi lnga dang dri zhim pos byugs shing 
24a1(rgyud 'grel): gser la sogs pa'i snod gtsang mar bzhag la/ rigs re re la yang rang rang gtso bor byas pa'i lnga lnga yod pas srad pa re re la yang lnga lnga ste nyi shu rtsa lnga bya'o// sngags pas bdag nyid kyi mig g.yas g.yon la 
24a2(rgyud 'grel): dza dkar dmar las bskyed pa'i nyi zla bskyed la/ de nyid la yang dzas so sor mtshon pa mig gis gzi ma 'dren par byed pa'i 'bar ba'i lta bas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du ltas te/ dzaHlas 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyi 
24a3(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyus ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka nas ye shes kyi skud pa drangs te/ ye shes lngas drangs pa'i dam tshig gi skud pa la thim par byas nas/ las thams cad pa'i dri'i chus bsang gtor byas pa'i dri dang me tog la
24a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa phul nas/ oM AHoM hUMHoM AHswA hUMHoM AHA hUM/ oM aHhA tAM/ oM aHhUM hUM zhes bzlas so// 'khal zhing sgril ba'i dus su yang / oM an+yon+d+ra nu ga ta sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma bar s+phar a nu ga ta sar+b+ba d+har+m+mA a t+yan ta a nu ga ta
